text:
Yeah! Josh came and did a talk with us a few weeks ago and it was really cool to hear his stuff works from his point of view !
For the orb we are just doing it in the 3D bit of Nuke. I am having a bit of trouble of animating it at the moment because I’m just hand animating it but it isn’t looking very realistic!

I was also wondering, about the whole being a woman in the industry and do you feel like it’s affected you in anyway? I haven’t really been able to ask these questions to guest lecturers as they have all been male, however I think we will be having some female lecturers in soon!
